attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: your friend lets you down and you need to sell on that ticket or one of your friends needs a ticket who you gonna go to. Making it illegal will only take it more underground with prices going through the roof. Do you realy think the tout cares about going to court and getting a £50 fine i dont think about it you will see the uproar at glastonbury this year when people cant sell their tickets on because no touts will be there to buy them.
